title: DHS Nilgiris Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Physiotherapist, DEO Posts
description: The District Health Society Nilgiris (DHS Nilgiris) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Physiotherapists and Data Entry Operator Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, BPT, and PGDM can apply for the DHS Nilgiris Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
